title: Starling Roost mullet hardtail mountain bike is a 140mm stainless steel stunner
content:
Hot on the heels of the Sturn V2 Jack Drive Downhill Bike is the new Starling Roost, a rather more earthly 140mm travel stainless steel hardtail. The Roost is Starling’s first punt at a rigid rear end. It rolls up on a mullet wheelset with a geometry that isn’t quite out-and-out “Hardcore Hardtail” territory, though

The post Starling Roost mullet hardtail mountain bike is a 140mm stainless steel stunner appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
